overview.en: EVS is the first STO project in the Asia-Pacific region with securities prospectus approved by ASIC- Australian Securities & Investments Commission. EVS platform provides a global market lending platform for small businesses by issuing bonds. EVS is a bond platform that issues tokens based on blockchain technology, providing unprecedented transparency for global investors and fully documenting their rights and terms of agreement. EVS platform uses the alternative data provided during the borrower's application to rate the borrower. Investors can choose to invest in this loan project manually or through My ELVIS Intelligent Investment Platform.
